name: Kids Time
description:
Kids Time is an accessible 2-player versus fighting game in which you and your opponent play as imaginary fighters made up by children's minds. 
Attack, Dodge, Block & Remember to put your guard at the right spot. The winner will be the one who shows the most cleverness and the keenest sense of timing.

Customize as you wish your appearance, and learn to use/counter wierd abilities !
Try out some of the 84 combinations !

Reduce your opponent's life to 0 3 times to win. Will you take the challenge ?

This game was developed in 4 month as a freshman school project by 4 game design students.

Controls
  -

    - Left Stick - Left or Right : Walk
    - Right Stick - Up or Down : Change Guard
    - RT : Attack
    - LT : Block
    - LB/RB : Dodge
    - A/X : First customizable ability (Arms)
    - B/Y : Second customizable ability (Legs)

Tips :
While blocking at the wrong spot causes you to lose stamina, blocking at the right spot does not cause you to lose stamina.
Successfully hitting your opponent restores stamina.
Not all abilities can be blocked or dodged. Be clever ;)
